1M1a1r1 1d1e1l1 1P1l1a1t1a1 1é1 1u1m1a1 1c1i1d1a1d1e1 1l1o1c1a1l1i1z1a1d1a1 1n1o1 1s1u1d1e1s1t1e1 1d1a1 1p1r1o1v1í1n1c1i1a1 1d1e1 1B1u1e1n1o1s1 1A1i1r1e1s1,1 1A1r1g1e1n1t1i1n1a1,1 1n1a1 1c1o1s1t1a1 1d1o1 1m1a1r1 1a1r1g1e1n1t1i1n1o1.1 1É1 1a1 1s1e1d1e1 1d1o1 1d1i1s1t1r1i1t1o1 1G1e1n1e1r1a1l1 1P1u1e1y2r1e1d1ó1n1,1 1u1m1 1i1m1p1o1r1t1a1n1t1e1 1p1o1r1t1o1 1e1 1e1s1t1â1n1c1i1a1 1t1e1r1m1a1l1 1e1 1a1 1s1e1g1u1n1d1a1 1c1i1d1a1d1e1 1t1u1r1í1s1t1i1c1a1 1m1a1i1s1 1i1m1p1o1r1t1a1n1t1e1 1d1o1 1p1a1í1s1 1d1e1p1o1i1s1 1d1e1 1B1u1e1n1o1s1 1A1i1r1e1s1,1 1j1á1 1q1u1e1 1n1o1 1v1e1r1ã1o1 1s1u1a1 1p1o1p1u1l1a1ç1ã1o1 1p1o1d1e1 1a1u1m1e1n1t1a1r1 1e1m1 1c1e1r1c1a1 1d1e1 13201%1.1 1u1m1a1 1a1m1p1l1a1 1g1a1m1a1 1d1e1 1i1n1f1r1a1e1s1t1r1u1t1u1r1a1 1h1o1t1e1l1e1i1r1a1.1 1A1 1r1o1d1o1v1i1a1 121 1a1 1c1o1n1e1c1t1a1 1a1p1ó1s1 1410141 1k1m1 1c1o1m1 1B1u1e1n1o1s1 1A1i1r1e1s1 1e1 1e1s1t1á1 1l1o1c1a1l1i1z1a1d1a1 1a1 1316151 1k1m1 1d1e1 1L1a1 1P1l1a1t1a1.2
1F1o1i1 1f1u1n1d1a1d1a1 1c1o1m1 1o1 1n1o1m1e1 1a1t1u1a1l1 1e1m1 11101 1d1e1 1f1e1v1e1r1e1i1r1o1 1d1e1 111817141 1p1o1r1 1P1a1t1r1i1c1i1o1 1P1e1r1a1l1t1a1 1R1a1m1o1s1,1 1e1m1 1u1m1a1 1f1a1z1e1n1d1a1 1d1e1 1s1u1a1 1p1r1o1p1r1i1e1d1a1d1e1,1 1c1o1m1 1b1a1s1e1 1n1a1 1s1e1g1u1n1d1a1 1d1a1s1 1t1r1ê1s1 1e1x1t1i1n1t1a1s1 1m1i2s1õ1e1s1 1j1e1s1u1í1t1a1s1 1d1e1 1L1a1 1P1a1m1p1a1,1 1f1u1n1d1a1d1a1 1n1a1 1s1e1g1u1n1d1a1 1m1e1t1a1d1e1 1d1o1 1s1é1c1u1l1o1 1X1V3I1,1 1d1e1n1o1m1i1n1a1d1a1 1N1o2s1a1 1S1e1n1h1o1r1a1 1d1e1 1P1i1l1a1r1 1d1e1 1P1u1e1l1c1h1e1s1,1 1q1u1e1 1m1a1i1s1 1t1a1r1d1e1 1r1e1c1e1b1e1u1 1o1 1n1o1m1e1 1d1e1 1"1P1u1e1r1t1o1 1d1e1 1l1a1 1L1a1g1u1n1a1 1d1e1 1l1o1s1 1P1a1d1r1e1s1"1.2
1A1s1 1p1r1i1n1c1i1p1a1i1s1 1i1n1d1ú1s1t1r1i1a1s1 1s1ã1o1 1a1 1p1e1s1c1a1,1 1o1 1t1u1r1i1s1m1o1 1e1 1o1s1 1t1ê1x1t1e1i1s1.1 1A1 1p1e1s1c1a1,1 1p1r1i1n1c1i1p1a1l1 1a1t1i1v1i1d1a1d1e1 1d1o1 1p1o1r1t1o1,1 1t1a1m1b1é1m1 1é1 1c1o1m1p1l1e1m1e1n1t1a1d1a1 1p1o1r1 1n1a1v1i1o1s1 1p1e1t1r1o1l1e1i1r1o1s1 1e1 1g1r1a1n1e1l1e1i1r1o1s1.1 1A1 1c1i1d1a1d1e1 1t1a1m1b1é1m1 1p1o2s1u1i1 1u1m1a1 1b1a1s1e1 1n1a1v1a1l1 1d1e1 1s1u1b1m1a1r1i1n1o1s1.1 1D1e1n1t1r1e1 1a1 1g1r1a1n1d1e1 1v1a1r1i1e1d1a1d1e1 1d1e1 1i1n1d1ú1s1t1r1i1a1s1,1 1d1e1s1t1a1c1a1m1-1s1e1 1a1s1 1d1e1r1i1v1a1d1a1s1 1d1a1 1h1o1r1t1i1c1u1l1t1u1r1a1,1 1c1o1n1s1t1r1u1ç1ã1o1,1 1m1e1t1a1l1u1r1g1i1a1 1e1 1m1e1c1â1n1i1c1a1.2
1A1 1c1i1d1a1d1e1 1p1o2s1u1i1 1u1m1 1c1o1m1p1l1e1x1o1 1e1s1p1o1r1t1i1v1o1 1q1u1e1 1f1o1i1 1p1a1l1c1o1 1d1a1 1C1o1p1a1 1d1o1 1M1u1n1d1o1 1d1e1 1F1u1t1e1b1o1l1 1d1e1 111917181,1 1p1a1l1c1o1 1d1o1s1 1J1o1g1o1s1 1P1a1n1-1a1m1e1r1i1c1a1n1o1s1 1d1e1 1129151 1e1 1o1n1d1e1 1f1o1i1 1d1i1s1p1u1t1a1d1a1 1a1 1f1i1n1a1l1 1d1a1 1C1o1p1a1 1D1a1v1i1s1 1220181.1 1C1l1u1b1 1A1t1l1é1t1i1c1o1 1A1l1d1o1s1i1v1i1 1e1 1C1l1u1b1 1A1t1l1é1t1i1c1o1 1A1l1v1a1r1a1d1o1 1s1ã1o1 1o1s1 1t1i1m1e1s1 1d1e1 1f1u1t1e1b1o1l1 1m1a1i1s1 1p1o1p1u1l1a1r1e1s1.1 1p1o1p1u1l1a1r1e1s1 1q1u1e1 1r1e1p1r1e1s1e1n1t1a1m1 1a1 1c1i1d1a1d1e1.1 1A1l1é1m1 1d1i2s1o1,1 1é1 1c1o1n1h1e1c1i1d1o1 1p1e1l1a1 1s1u1a1 1q1u1a1l1i1d1a1d1e1 1n1o1 1b1a1s1q1u1e1t1e1,1 1o1n1d1e1 1o1 1C1l1u1b1 1A1t1l1é1t1i1c1o1 1P1e1ñ1a1r1o1l1 1e1 1o1 1C1l1u1b1 1A1t1l1é1t1i1c1o1 1Q1u1i1l1m1e1s1 1r1e1p1r1e1s1e1n1t1a1m1 1e1s1t1e1 1e1s1p1o1r1t1e1 1a1 1n1í1v1e1l1 1n1a1c1i1o1n1a1l1.2
1D1e1s1d1e1 1o1 1s1e1u1 1i1n1í1c1i1o1,1 1a1 1p1o1p1u1l1a1ç1ã1o1 1d1e1 1M1a1r1 1d1e1l1 1P1l1a1t1a1 1c1a1r1a1c1t1e1r1i1z1o1u1-1s1e1 1p1o1r1 1u1m1a1 1f1o1r1t1e1 1i1n1f1l1u1ê1n1c1i1a1 1d1e1 1m1i1g1r1a1ç1õ1e1s1 1i1n1t1e1r1n1a1s1 1e1 1e1x1t1e1r1n1a1s1.1 1A2s1i1m1,1 1e1m1 111819151,1 14101%1 1d1a1 1p1o1p1u1l1a1ç1ã1o1 1d1o1 1P1a1r1t1i1d1o1 1e1r1a1 1e1s1t1r1a1n1g1e1i1r1a1,1 1p1r1e1d1o1m1i1n1a1n1t1e1m1e1n1t1e1 1d1e1 1o1r1i1g1e1m1 1i1t1a1l1i1a1n1a1 1e1 1e1s1p1a1n1h1o1l1a1.1 1A1 1p1a1r1t1i1r1 1d1e2s1a1 1é1p1o1c1a1,1 1u1m1 1a1u1m1e1n1t1o1 1p1o1p1u1l1a1c1i1o1n1a1l1 1c1o1m1e1ç1o1u1 1a1 1s1e1r1 1p1e1r1c1e1b1i1d1o1 1n1o1 1v1e1r1ã1o1,1 1n1ã1o1 1s1ó1 1d1e1 1v1e1r1a1n1i1s1t1a1s1,1 1m1a1s1 1t1a1m1b1é1m1 1d1a1 1p1o1p1u1l1a1ç1ã1o1 1c1o1m1 1i1n1t1e1n1ç1ã1o1 1d1e1 1s1e1 1i1n1s1t1a1l1a1r1 1n1a1 1c1i1d1a1d1e1.2
1A1 1t1a1x1a1 1d1e1 1c1r1e1s1c1i1m1e1n1t1o1 1d1e1m1o1g1r1á1f1i1c1o1 1f1o1i1 1m1u1i1t1o1 1l1e1n1t1a1 1n1o1 1i1n1í1c1i1o1,1 1s1ó1 1d1e1p1o1i1s1 1d1o1 1c1e1n1s1o1 1d1e1 111914171 1u1l1t1r1a1p1a2s1o1u1 1o1s1 11201.301 1h1a1b1i1t1a1n1t1e1s1,1 1v1a1l1o1r1 1q1u1e1 1d1o1b1r1o1u1 1e1m1 111916101 1c1o1m1 1a1 1c1h1e1g1a1d1a1 1d1e1 1f1a1m1í1l1i1a1s1 1p1r1i1n1c1i1p1a1l1m1e1n1t1e1 1d1e1 1B1u1e1n1o1s1 1A1i1r1e1s1,1 1d1o1 1i1n1t1e1r1i1o1r1 1d1o1 1p1a1í1s1 1e1 1d1a1 1p1r1o1v1í1n1c1i1a1.1 1O1 1c1e1n1s1o1 1d1e1 1129111 1c1o1n1t1o1u1 1c1e1r1c1a1 1d1e1 15201.301 1h1a1b1i1t1a1n1t1e1s1 1n1a1 1c1i1d1a1d1e1.2
1A1 1c1i1d1a1d1e1 1d1e1 1M1a1r1 1d1e1l1 1P1l1a1t1a1,1 1c1o1m1o1 1q1u1a1l1q1u1e1r1 1o1u1t1r1a1 1c1i1d1a1d1e1 1t1u1r1í1s1t1i1c1a1 1d1o1 1m1u1n1d1o1,1 1e1x1p1e1r1i1m1e1n1t1a1 1u1m1a1 1v1a1r1i1a1ç1ã1o1 1n1o1t1á1v1e1l1 1e1n1t1r1e1 1a1 1p1o1p1u1l1a1ç1ã1o1 1e1s1t1á1v1e1l1 1e1 1a1 1s1a1z1o1n1a1l1.1 1C1o1m1 1o1 1a1u1m1e1n1t1o1 1d1a1 1p1o1p1u1l1a1ç1ã1o1,1 1é1 1n1e1c1e2s1á1r1i1o1 1g1e1r1a1r1 1u1m1a1 1m1a1i1o1r1 1o1f1e1r1t1a1 1d1e1 1b1e1n1s1 1e1 1s1e1r1v1i1ç1o1s1 1d1u1r1a1n1t1e1 1o1s1 1p1e1r1í1o1d1o1s1 1d1e1 1f1é1r1i1a1s1 1o1u1 1f1i1n1a1i1s1 1d1e1 1s1e1m1a1n1a1 1p1r1o1l1o1n1g1a1d1o1s1.2
1N1o1 1c1e1n1s1o1 1a1r1g1e1n1t1i1n1o1 1d1e1 121011101,1 1a1 1c1i1f1r1a1 1e1r1a1 1d1e1 1519131.23171 1h1a1b1i1t1a1n1t1e1s1 1(1v1e1r1 1R1E1D1A1T1A1M1,1 1s1i1t1e1 1o1f1i1c1i1a1l1 1d1o1 1I1N1D1E1C1)1 1d1e1 1u1m1 1t1o1t1a1l1 1d1e1 1311161.1011141 1d1o1m1i1c1í1l1i1o1s1 1c1a1d1a1s1t1r1a1d1o1s1,1 1d1o1s1 1q1u1a1i1s1 14181%1 1p1e1r1t1e1n1c1e1m1 1a1 1h1o1m1e1n1s1 1e1 15121%1 1a1 1m1u1l1h1e1r1e1s1.1 1P1o1r1 1s1u1a1 1v1e1z1,1 1e1s1t1e1 1v1a1l1o1r1 1r1e1p1r1e1s1e1n1t1a1 1u1m1 1a1c1r1é1s1c1i1m1o1 1d1e1 151,161%1 1e1m1 1r1e1l1a1ç1ã1o1 1a1o1s1 1511121.1810191 1d1o1 1c1e1n1s1o1 1a1n1t1e1r1i1o1r1;1 1D1e1v1i1d1o1 1a1 1e1s1t1a1 1b1a1i1x1a1 1t1a1x1a1 1d1e1 1c1r1e1s1c1i1m1e1n1t1o1 1p1o1p1u1l1a1c1i1o1n1a1l1,1 1c1o1n1c1l1u1i1-1s1e1 1q1u1e1 1h1o1u1v1e1 1u1m1 1l1i1g1e1i1r1o1 1ê1x1o1d1o1 1p1o1p1u1l1a1c1i1o1n1a1l1 1n1a1 1ú1l1t1i1m1a1 1d1é1c1a1d1a1.2
1E1s1t1e1 1t1a1m1a1n1h1o1 1p1o1p1u1l1a1c1i1o1n1a1l1 1a1 1c1o1l1o1c1a1 1c1o1m1o1 1o1 1s1é1t1i1m1o1 1c1e1n1t1r1o1 1m1a1i1s1 1p1o1p1u1l1o1s1o1 1d1a1 1A1r1g1e1n1t1i1n1a1 1e1 1o1 1t1e1r1c1e1i1r1o1 1d1a1 1P1r1o1v1í1n1c1i1a1 1d1e1 1B1u1e1n1o1s1 1A1i1r1e1s1.1 1D1o1 1p1o1n1t1o1 1d1e1 1v1i1s1t1a1 1g1e1o1g1r1á1f1i1c1o1,1 1é1 1c1o1n1s1i1d1e1r1a1d1a1 1a1 1c1i1d1a1d1e1 1c1o1s1t1e1i1r1a1 1m1a1i1s1 1p1o1p1u1l1o1s1a1 1d1a1 1A1r1g1e1n1t1i1n1a1.2

1A1 1h1i1s1t1ó1r1i1a1 1d1a1 1e1c1o1n1o1m1i1a1 1d1e1 1M1a1r1 1d1e1l1 1P1l1a1t1a1 1r1e1f1l1e1t1e1 1o1 1s1e1u1 1p1r1ó1p1r1i1o1 1d1i1n1a1m1i1s1m1o1,1 1d1e1v1i1d1o1 1à1s1 1s1u1a1s1 1c1a1r1a1c1t1e1r1í1s1t1i1c1a1s1 1d1e1 1b1a1l1n1e1á1r1i1o1 1e1 1c1i1d1a1d1e1 1i1n1d1u1s1t1r1i1a1l1,1 1d1i1n1a1m1i1s1m1o1 1q1u1e1 1e1m1 1c1e1r1t1a1 1m1e1d1i1d1a1 1é1 1i1m1p1u1l1s1i1o1n1a1d1o1 1a1o1 1l1o1n1g1o1 1d1o1 1t1e1m1p1o1 1p1e1l1a1s1 1d1i1f1e1r1e1n1t1e1s1 1r1e1a1l1i1d1a1d1e1s1 1n1a1c1i1o1n1a1i1s1.1 1D1o1i1s1 1m1o1m1e1n1t1o1s1 1d1i1s1t1i1n1t1o1s1 1e1x1e1m1p1l1i1f1i1c1a1m1 1o1 1q1u1e1 1f1o1i1 1d1i1t1o1,1 1a1 1A1r1g1e1n1t1i1n1a1,1 1m1o1d1e1l1o1 1a1g1r1o1e1x1p1o1r1t1a1d1o1r1 1d1o1 1f1i1n1a1l1 1d1o1 1s1é1c1u1l1o1 1X1I1X1,1 1p1r1o1v1o1c1o1u1 1m1u1d1a1n1ç1a1s1 1n1a1 1e1c1o1n1o1m1i1a1 1r1e1g1i1o1n1a1l1,1 1j1á1 1q1u1e1 1n1ã1o1 1e1r1a1 1a1p1e1n1a1s1 1f1a1v1o1r1e1c1i1d1a1 1p1e1l1a1 1r1i1q1u1e1z1a1 1p1e1c1u1á1r1i1a1,1 1m1a1s1 1a1o1 1m1e1s1m1o1 1t1e1m1p1o1 1u1m1 1b1a1l1n1e1á1r1i1o1 1d1e1s1t1i1n1a1d1o1 1à1 1r1e1s1i1s1t1i1r1 1e1 1t1r1a1n1s1f1o1r1m1a1r1 1o1 1e1i1x1o1 1r1u1r1a1l1 1q1u1e1 1a1t1é1 1e1n1t1ã1o1 1e1r1a1 1a1 1p1a1r1t1e1 1c1o1n1s1t1i1t1u1t1i1v1a1 1d1a1 1e1c1o1n1o1m1i1a1.2
1N1o1 1f1i1n1a1l1 1d1o1 1s1é1c1u1l1o1 1X1I1X1,1 1f1o1r1m1o1u1-1s1e1 1u1m1 1e1i1x1o1 1u1r1b1a1n1o1-1t1u1r1í1s1t1i1c1o1-1c1o1m1e1r1c1i1a1l1.1 1O1u1t1r1o1 1e1v1e1n1t1o1 1d1e1 1c1u1n1h1o1 1n1a1c1i1o1n1a1l1 1q1u1e1 1t1r1o1u1x1e1 1m1u1d1a1n1ç1a1s1 1e1s1t1r1u1t1u1r1a1i1s1 1é1 1o1 1p1r1o1c1e2s1o1 1q1u1e1 1s1e1 1i1n1i1c1i1o1u1 1n1a1 1d1é1c1a1d1a1 1d1e1 111913101 1e1 1c1u1l1m1i1n1o1u1 1c1o1m1 1o1 1a1d1v1e1n1t1o1 1d1o1 1p1e1r1o1n1i1s1m1o1 1n1a1 1d1é1c1a1d1a1 1d1e1 111914101.
